name: NSError
desc: Information about an error condition including a domain, a domain-specific error code, and application-specific information.

items.name: domain
items.desc: A string containing the error domain.

items.name: localizedDescription
items.desc: A string containing the localized description of the error.

items.name: localizedRecoveryOptions
items.desc: An array containing the localized titles of buttons appropriate for displaying in an alert panel.

items.name: localizedRecoverySuggestion
items.desc: A string containing the localized recovery suggestion for the error.

items.name: localizedFailureReason
items.desc: A string containing the localized explanation of the reason for the error.

items.name: setUserInfoValueProvider
items.desc: Specifies a block to call when the corresponding property is not present in the user info dictionary.

items.name: userInfoValueProvider
items.desc: Returns any user info provider specified for a given error domain.

items.name: recoveryAttempter
items.desc: The object in the user info dictionary corresponding to the NSRecoveryAttempterErrorKey key.

items.name: helpAnchor
items.desc: A string to display in response to an alert panel help anchor button being pressed.

items.name: NSStreamSOCKSErrorDomain
items.desc: The error domain used by NSError when reporting SOCKS errors.

items.name: NSStreamSocketSSLErrorDomain
items.desc: The error domain used by NSError when reporting SSL errors.

items.name: fileProviderErrorForCollision
items.desc: Returns a properly formatted error object with a NSFileProviderItemCollisionError error code.
